nodes.text: The Sith Empire was an empire of the Sith that was founded by the fallen Jedi Exar Kun and Ulic Qel-Droma in the millennium following the Great Hyperspace War, according to the quasi-historical Qel-Droma Epics. The Sith Empire existed after the fall of a predecessor empire, also named the Sith Empire, that was led by the Sith Lord Naga Sadow during the war.
